strings.string: Effective Date of Rollback Entries when Enabling or Disabling Rollback
WARNING: Resetting rollback will delete all existing rollback data. This data will not be recoverable. Ensure you have made a backup of your system before resetting rollback.
Purge Files and File Versioning Entries Before (period)

This tool provides options to manage Rollback data. Rollback can be enabled or disabled and existing rollback data can be removed, either by age or in its entirety. Existing entries can also be set to a certain point in time.
Are you sure you want to delete all the redundant entries?
This will delete all the redundant Cron Manager rollback entries
